---
name: design-system-blueprint
description: Create a compact, high-rigor design system blueprint (tokens, type, grid, components) before implementation.
agent: 'Art Direction Planner'
---

Scope: ${selection}

Produce:
- Token taxonomy (colour, type, spacing, radius, elevation, motion)
- Typography scale (sizes, weights, line-heights, letter-spacing)
- Grid rules (columns, gutters, breakpoints)
- Atomic design map (atoms→molecules→organisms)
- Component standards (states, a11y, naming)

Ask for any missing brief info first.
